attributes.action: deal with unfair charges from banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Brown,I am asking you to deal with unfair charges from banks. I am a British tax payer and so was my wife until the birth of our first son in March.I,like most of the British people am sick to the back teeth of these ridiculous £30+ fines for being £1 overdrawn.Do you not think that as we the tax payers are being asked to bail out the banks(even though it is they who put themselves in this position!)that a condition of this bailout should be the abolition of this crazy practice.As a new family on only my wages for us all i think it is completely wrong for fat cat bankers to effectively steal our money.Please Mr Brown help your people
sincerly
Kris Copeland
Larne
N.Ireland
U.K.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
